name: Pod AI
long_description: Pod is your round-the-clock team of AI agents for customer service. They pick up every call instantly, talk to customers like real people, answer common questions, place orders or appointments, and hand off the tricky stuff to a live repâ€”no phone trees, no hold music. Because they plug straight into your CRM and scheduling tools, your customers get fast, human-sounding help while your staff stays focused on the conversations that truly need them.
one_liner: AI Phone Agents for Customer Support
